name: CBYT
purpose: This function will return the given field as a B type (1 byte integer) field.

parts.description: The field to be converted to B type.

return_type: B The original field is not changed.
comments: F, P, T, and D type fields cannot be converted to B; however, all others can. If an L type field is converted, a .T. value will be converted to 1, a .F. to 0. If the value of the field to be converted is larger than the maximum value of a B type field (255), the converted value will not be accurate.
